query user ($after: String, $first: Int, $searchPhrase: String, $id: String, $userName: String, $email: String, $loginProvider: String, $providerKey: String) {
    user (id: $id, userName: $userName, email: $email, loginProvider: $loginProvider, providerKey: $providerKey) {
        accessFailedCount
        contact {
            addresses {
                addressType
                city
                countryCode
                countryName
                email
                firstName
                key
                lastName
                line1
                line2
                middleName
                name
                organization
                phone
                postalCode
                regionId
                regionName
                zip
            }
            birthDate
            firstName
            fullName
            id
            lastName
            memberType
            middleName
            name
            organizationId
            organizations {
                addresses {
                    addressType
                    city
                    countryCode
                    countryName
                    email
                    firstName
                    key
                    lastName
                    line1
                    line2
                    middleName
                    name
                    organization
                    phone
                    postalCode
                    regionId
                    regionName
                    zip
                }
                businessCategory
                contacts (after: $after, first: $first, searchPhrase: $searchPhrase) {
                    edges {
                        cursor
                    }
                    items {
                        birthDate
                        firstName
                        fullName
                        id
                        lastName
                        memberType
                        middleName
                        name
                        organizationId
                        organizationsIds
                        outerId
                        phones
                    }
                    pageInfo {
                        endCursor
                        hasNextPage
                        hasPreviousPage
                        startCursor
                    }
                    totalCount
                }
                description
                emails
                groups
                id
                memberType
                name
                outerId
                ownerId
                parentId
                phones
                seoObjectType
            }
            organizationsIds
            outerId
            phones
            securityAccounts {
                accessFailedCount
                contact {
                    birthDate
                    firstName
                    fullName
                    id
                    lastName
                    memberType
                    middleName
                    name
                    organizationId
                    organizationsIds
                    outerId
                    phones
                }
                createdBy
                createdDate
                email
                emailConfirmed
                id
                isAdministrator
                lockoutEnabled
                lockoutEnd
                memberId
                modifiedBy
                modifiedDate
                normalizedEmail
                normalizedUserName
                passwordExpired
                permissions
                phoneNumber
                phoneNumberConfirmed
                photoUrl
                roles {
                    description
                    id
                    name
                    normalizedName
                    permissions
                }
                securityStamp
                storeId
                twoFactorEnabled
                userName
                userType
            }
        }
        createdBy
        createdDate
        email
        emailConfirmed
        id
        isAdministrator
        lockoutEnabled
        lockoutEnd
        memberId
        modifiedBy
        modifiedDate
        normalizedEmail
        normalizedUserName
        passwordExpired
        permissions
        phoneNumber

        photoUrl
